Posts.Content: Aug 29, 2013 11:07AM angelmom wrote: They did not say to come back inn 6 months but just next year as usual. I have my yearly physical in September and will talk to my doctor them. I had a mammogram 3 years ago at 40 and skipped the past 2 years. The mammogram is done at a different building than my physical so I figured I would go get it done. I hadn't heard of calcifications before and will definitely be going regularly now! I will keep hoping you both get good news!
Posts.Title: Stereotactic Needle Biopsy MomOf3AwesomeKids MelissaDallas

Posts.Content: Aug 29, 2013 01:44AM angelmom wrote: I just had the same thng done for microcalcifications that were clustered yesterday. They already called me today and they are benign. So happy and hope you get the same results. As I was told, 80% are benign. They did show me the samples they took and it looked like quite a few. I was going to ask about that but didn't.
